item.title: ‘Alien: Earth’ Really Lost The Plot By The End Thanks To Wendy
item.description: Alien: Earth started out very strong, but it totally lost the plot by the end of the show thanks to the extremely overpowered Wendy.

item.title: Trump’s $100,000 H-1B Visa Fee Could Deepen America’s Doctor Shortage
item.description: Trump’s $100K H-1B visa fee could worsen the U.S. doctor shortage, making it harder for hospitals to hire international physicians and serve patients.

item.title: Gene Therapy Could End Lifelong Transfusions For Rare Blood Disorder
item.description: A single one-time gene therapy could free patients with α-thalassemia, a rare and debilitating blood disorder, from the burden of lifelong transfusion...

item.title: ‘Quordle’ Today: Hints, Answers For Friday, September 26
